category.name: Data Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Baseline_check_all
preference.preference_description: Allows the baseline operation to check synchronization between NX and BOMViewRevision even when the ItemRevision cannot be baselined. Valid Values: false - Do not check synchronization on ItemRevisions that cannot be baselined. true - Check synchronization on ItemRevisions that cannot be baselined.
